# Let's play a Pokemon Memory Game!
## Gotta Match 'Em All!

![Pokemon](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/7f96f370-eb51-4aaf-b415-276b6c86a20b/d6bjw8r-54c513ea-e1dc-427d-8c47-9ef2175718ad.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..dwPe5TGAf7BxKGsaO3DhPpB3hsmMCzkNv2EHkzT0PQY)

Click the cards to find and match the Pokemon. When you match them all, you win!


## Technologies & Dependencies Utilized:

* React
* React Dom
* Redux
